---
title: "connect-to-postgresql"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(DBI)
library(RPostgres)
```

```{r}
con <- DBI::dbConnect(
  RPostgres::Postgres(),
  dbname = Sys.getenv("dbname"),
  host = Sys.getenv("host"),
  port = Sys.getenv("port"),
  user = Sys.getenv("user"),
  password = Sys.getenv("password")
)
```

```{r}
dbDisconnect(con)
```
